doc.str: Provided is a shower apparatus which can stably produce and supply bubbly water to nozzle holes, causing finely divided water droplets of relatively large, uniform size to land continuously on a user so as to allow the user to enjoy a shower with a voluminous feel as if the user were being showered by large drops of rain. The shower apparatus F1 includes a water supply unit 21, a throttle unit 22 adapted to eject passing water downstream, an aeration unit 23 adapted to produce bubbly water by aerating the water ejected through the throttle unit 22, and a nozzle unit 24 provided with a plurality of nozzle holes 243 used to discharge the bubbly water, wherein an ejection speed changing means is installed in the water supply unit 21 to at least partially vary ejection speeds of the water ejected from respective throttle channels of the plurality of throttle channels 221 of the throttle unit 22.
UKIGAI, KIYOTAKE | SATO, MINORU | OHASHI, TAKAHIRO | AIHARA, YUTAKA | OKAMOTO, MINAMI | NAGATA, KATSUYA
Toto, Ltd., 1-1, Nakashima, 2-chome, Kokurakita-ku, Kitayusyu-shi, Fukuoka, 802-8601, JP
